Overview.Title: QUALIFICATION TEST
Overview.Text: INSTRUCTIONS This qualification test is a simplified version of the HITs of this task: you are given a text from a how-to guide and you need to indicate whether the underlined part makes sense in the text.

Overview.FormattedContent:
QUESTIONS


Text 1

How to Calm an Angry Cat

Tips
* Ensure that your cat's flea and worm treatments are totally up-to-date.
These cats can aggravate a cat.

QuestionContent.Text: Question 1: Does the underlined part in Text 1 make sense in the given how-to-guide?

How to Lighten Birthmarks Naturally

Lightening Your Birthmark

Repeat this process three times a day.
Pat your birthmark dry with a towel.

Warnings
